title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.27 - Smoking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.27 - Smoking

State Regulations

Smoking is prohibited in all public areas within any park, except as may be designated by ParksCorp or BPCA. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
